meanings.definition: The position or status of being a boss.
meanings.sent1: In the company, her bossdom was unquestioned.
meanings.sent2: His bossdom allowed him to make important decisions.
meanings.sent3: She ruled over her bossdom with a fair hand.
meanings.sent4: His bossdom extended to every corner of the office.
meanings.sent5: The bossdom of the CEO was felt throughout the organization.

meanings.definition: The authority or power of a boss.
meanings.sent1: With great bossdom, he directed his team effectively.
meanings.sent2: Her bossdom was evident in the way she handled difficult situations.
meanings.sent3: The bossdom of the office manager was respected by all.
meanings.sent4: His bossdom was like a shield protecting his employees.
meanings.sent5: The bossdom of the supervisor kept the team in line.

meanings.definition: The domain or realm over which a boss has control.
meanings.sent1: Her bossdom included multiple departments within the company.
meanings.sent2: The bossdom of the warehouse manager covered all inventory operations.
meanings.sent3: In her bossdom, she was the queen of efficiency.
meanings.sent4: His bossdom was a well-oiled machine of productivity.
meanings.sent5: The bossdom of the restaurant owner extended to the entire establishment.
